docs.snippet: As trade tensions rise between the United States and China, a small but vocal online community is calling for a boycott of U.S. products, fanning fears that American brands could see a backlash similar to that faced by South Korea last year.

headline.print_headline: Trade Tensions Stoke Worries of Anti-U.S. Backlash in China

docs.snippet: Fifty years after a shot rang out in Memphis, killing the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr., freedom rang from the balcony of the Lorraine Motel as a bell tolled 39 times to mark a life cut short by racism.

headline.print_headline: Admirers Mourn King, Pledge to Carry on Unfinished Work

docs.snippet: Iowa is set to become the latest Republican-led state to target so-called sanctuary cities by withholding money from local governments that don't comply with federal immigration laws, even though the plan could lead to court challenges.
